name: Generic Activity Recognition
description: A general-purpose DAG for monitoring common human activities

idle.description: Person is idle, not performing any specific action

reach.description: Person is reaching for or toward something

grasp.description: Person is grasping or holding an object

manipulate.description: Person is manipulating or operating something

place.description: Person is placing an object somewhere

release.description: Person is releasing or letting go of something

retract.description: Person is pulling back or withdrawing hand

gesture.description: Person is making a communicative gesture

walk.description: Person is walking or moving position

transition_rules.reach_requires_target: Reaching should have a target object or location
transition_rules.grasp_follows_reach: Grasping typically follows a reach action
transition_rules.release_follows_hold: Release happens after holding or manipulating
